comments: DyslexiaEasyRead App is suitable for readers with dyslexia of all ages, including children with reading difficulties.
features: Designed to make reading easier, comfortable, and engaging for users of all ages. Modify word spacing, letter size, background color, confusing characters / words and highlight styles to create the reading environment that reduces visual stress. Supports both speech-to-text and text-to-speech functionalities. Supports 58 languages translation.
title: DyslexiaEasyRead
